name: Dungeon Faster (itch)
description:
Find the door and boss in the room, kill the boss (click on the crossed swords icon for strike) and door will be opened for you, then enter to the next dungeon room. 

Gain the Rainbow Gems from dead bosses etc. and upgrade your card collection.

Collect tilepowers, play the cards, loot the hoards - simply "Dungeon Faster".
